senses.sense_definition: The scientific study of the creation, manipulation, and use of plasma.

examples.text: The university created a new department dedicated to <w>plasmology</w> and fusion research.
Advances in <w>plasmology</w> may eventually lead to cleaner sources of energy.

senses.sense_definition: The study of the microscopic structure of tissues and cells.

examples.text: In older medical texts, the detailed study of cell structures was sometimes called <w>plasmology</w>.
The biologist specialized in <w>plasmology</w> to better understand organic tissues.
